createCustomer.title: Create Customer Account
createCustomer.subtitle: Create a new customer account in Clerk authentication system
createCustomer.cardDescription: Enter the customer details below. The account will be created with customer role.

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters

notes.title: Important Notes
notes.note1: The account will be created with 'customer' role automatically
notes.note2: User will be able to sign in immediately with these credentials
notes.note3: Customer access to specific companies must be configured separately
notes.note4: Use the 'Authenticate User' section to link customers to companies

createAdmin.title: Create Admin Account
createAdmin.subtitle: Create a new administrator account with full system access
createAdmin.cardDescription: Enter the admin details below. This account will have full administrative privileges.

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters

warning.title: ⚠️ Important Security Notice
warning.note1: Admin accounts have full system access and can manage all users
warning.note2: Admin accounts can create, modify, and delete other accounts
warning.note3: Admin accounts have access to all customer data and orders
warning.note4: Only create admin accounts for trusted personnel
warning.note5: Use strong, unique passwords for admin accounts

authenticateUser.title: Authenticate User
authenticateUser.subtitle: Search for users and link them to customer accounts

search.title: Search User
search.description: Enter the email address of the user you want to authenticate
search.notFound: No user found with this email address

adminWarning.title: Admin User Detected
adminWarning.message: You cannot edit admin users! Admin accounts have full system access and don't need customer associations. Customer IDs are only for users with 'customer' role.

selectedCustomers.title: Selected Customers
selectedCustomers.description: These customers will be linked to the user
selectedCustomers.removeHint: Click on any customer badge to remove it from selection

linkCustomers.title: Link to Customers
linkCustomers.description: Select which customer accounts this user should have access to
linkCustomers.searchPlaceholder: Search customers by name or ID...
linkCustomers.noCustomers: No customers available. Please ensure customers exist in the system.

success.title: Success!
success.message: User access has been updated successfully.
